text: i believe that i've made a difference in
helping through the medium of wine to
aid in the transformation of the south
african wine industry
about seven years ago
on a very random chance trip to south
africa i learned an interesting
statistic
which was that south africa had this
amazing
350 year old industry wine industry
that exported nearly 3 billion
worth of wine every year but less than 2
percent was owned by the black majority
and it was a legacy that
existed during apartheid that had yet to
catch up with the transformation of the
industry and while i was living on
campus
as a partner
since my husband also went to hbs i got
the bright idea that if we didn't do
something to help in the transformation
then somebody else would jump at the
chance
